content.en: Robotic navigation: Researchers have been exploring the use of algorithms to enable mobile robots to navigate in unknown and complex environments. These algorithms, such as fuzzy logic, neuro-fuzzy approaches, and reinforcement learning, play a crucial role in determining the priorities of heading directions, processing sensory data, avoiding obstacles, and reaching goals. By integrating these intelligent algorithms, robots can autonomously navigate and make decisions based on their surroundings, improving their behavior and learning speed.
content.da: Robotnavigering: Forskere har undersøgt brugen af algoritmer for at gøre mobile robotter i stand til at navigere i ukendte og komplekse miljøer. Disse algoritmer, såsom fuzzy logic, neuro-fuzzy tilgange og forstærkningslæring, spiller en afgørende rolle i at bestemme prioriteringer for bevægelsesretninger, behandle sensoriske data, undgå forhindringer og nå mål. Ved at integrere disse intelligente algoritmer kan robotter autonomt navigere og træffe beslutninger baseret på deres omgivelser, hvilket forbedrer deres adfærd og læringshastighed.
